record.field: TB at reporting date with account codes, currency, comparatives
Full GL export for period + prior year
COA with descriptions and cost centre mapping
Last 12 months + up to audit date
Recs for each account with supporting clearing items
Template list of banks & account numbers for auditor confirmations
Sales invoices, credit notes, month-wise summary
Last invoices before/after year end, shipment docs
Customer list, aged balances, collection status
Invoices/receipts around year end, receiving reports
Stock listing, costing method, valuation supporting docs
Stock take sheets, cut-off docs, variance explanation
Details of cost, accumulated depreciation, location, custodian
Purchase invoices, approval memos, disposal docs

Filed returns, computation, payments and assessments
WHT deducted, deposited with FBR, challans
All minutes for the year (BoD, audit committee)

Pending claims, contingent liabilities, counsel opinion
Parties, balances, agreements and disclosure support
JV agreements, sale/purchase of business docs
Grant contracts, restrictions, utilisation reports (Priority note: High (if NPO))
Donor returns, project budgets vs actuals (Priority note: High (if applicable))
Flowcharts, policy manuals, internal control narrative
User access matrix, privileged users, backups
AR/AP aged, GL trial balance, inventory movements
Backup schedule, restore tests, change logs
